main_definition: The act of expressing an intention to inflict harm, injury or damage; a warning that indicates danger or hostility.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Intention to cause fear or alarm
meanings_and_examples.example: His constant harassment was threatening and made her feel unsafe.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A verbal or written expression of an intention to harm someone or something
meanings_and_examples.example: The storm clouds were a menacing threat, signaling that a severe weather event might occur.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An action or statement meant to intimidate another person
meanings_and_examples.example: Spitting on someone is not only rude but also threatening behavior.
The malfunctioning equipment posed a threat to the safety of all workers in the area.
